Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 17th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1980...
Injured on 5/16/1980 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 4/16/1981 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Earned first career win on 8/13/1984...
Had first career hit on 4/12/1985, off Steve Trout (OAK)...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1988...
Traded from Minnesota to St. Louis on 2/10/1989 (Going to STL: P C. Guante. Going to MIN: RF P. O'Neill)...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/29/1989 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Injured on 5/21/1991 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1991, going 5-1, 2.44...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/17/1991 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 5/29/1992 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 8/7/1992 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 5 weeks...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1993, going 5-0, 0.77...
Won World Series with St. Louis in 1993...
Won Cy Young Award in 1993, going 24-8, 2.21 ERA...
Injured on 6/8/1994 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 5/21/1995 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for full season...
Injured on 4/22/1996 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/19/1996 with a Broken Finger, out for 5-6 weeks...
